title: Art and perception: learning to see
creator_contributor_role: Paul Bunford Film Productions, production company
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Art - Study and teaching
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Perception
Crafts & Visual Arts/Art - Study and teaching
description: The viewer is encouraged to look for the visual elements of art- colour, line, texture and form- as the film explores different settings: the country, the city and the seashore. Presents a variety of paintings of these environments that illustrate the visual inspiration and imaginative inventiveness the artist brought to his subject. No other credits available.
